qas.question: What year did FOX announce that American Idol was cancelled?
What year did FOX announce the cancellation of American Idol?
For how many seasons did American Idol air?
How many consecutive years did American Idol been ranked number one in ratings?
When did Fox announce that American Idol is ending?

context: For an unprecedented <a3_0>eight<a3_0/> consecutive years, from the 2003–04 television season through the 2010–11 season, either its performance or result show had been ranked number one in U.S. television ratings. The popularity of American Idol however declined, and on <a4_0>May 11, <a0_0><a1_0>20<a2_0>15<a4_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/><a0_0/>, Fox announced that the series would conclude its run in its fifteenth season.
